title: Alistar's sped up animation.
body:
What are the chances Riot would go to the effort of changing how Alistar runs when he is sped up by homeguard and other movement speed related things from being what it is now to him running on all fours?


For Example , Volibears Q animation?

replies.body: That would be cool tbh but he would run like a gorilla since his upper body is bigger than his lower body

his body is probably too disproportionate to be able to do that now

but we can always dream
